page.title: 06Camp Site-Dorking NE
page.content: This{42 acre wood and grassland}site is used by many types of people.It is in the "middle of nowhere"! The land is owned by Surrey County Council. It is a good site because it is{educational,}gives pleasure and a sense of adventure.{Wildlife}is often seen, such as deer,foxes,rabbits, squirrels,badgers and birds,e.g.owls and hawks. Last year there were 9,000 campers. A timetable is sent ahead of any camping party with suggested activities. If the warden does not approve of it,he returns it for more thought.Camping there is{cheap}(there -fore available to poorer families), as campers only have to pay between 45p and 65p per day.
